comments.body: It would seem that you could avoid a lot of duplicated boilerplate code, e.g., by introducing variables "small_dim" and "large_dim" and combining  PerformSVD_MlessN and  PerformSVD_MgeqN.

Yes, I know that there is quite some duplication. But because I have to handle the matrices differently in terms of transposition each time I need this. It could have been combined into one function with if-statements on which matrix should be transposed.
There's a tradeoff between two functions for the two cases and one function for both with many if-statements for which matrix to transpose (and whether we need an additional copy of the input matrix).
I doubt that it is worth it.
